issue.title: [C++][Compute] Add is_inf kernel for floating point arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12843](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12843). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add a scalar kernel `is_inf` that returns true at the positions of a floating point number array that have positive or negative infinite values (`inf` and `-inf`) and false at other positions. The implementation of this should be similar to `is_nan`.
